title: Butternut squash and walnut risotto
ingredients: ['1.5L chicken stock', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 shallots, finely diced', '400g Arborio rice', '50g walnuts', '450g butternut squash, cubed', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'cayenne pepper, to taste', 'grated Parmesan cheese, to garnish']
